participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Jessica loves to share her interests with others. She has a great sense of humor and enjoys light-hearted conversations.
participant_1.background: i like tacos. i've three sisters. i love dogs. i live in alabama. i have one brother.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is practical and down-to-earth. He enjoys hands-on activities and has a nurturing side, especially when it comes to gardening.
participant_2.background: i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple.
